description: From Jehu, son of Nimshi. 2 Kings 9:20.

entries.meaning: (colloquial, dated) A coachman; a driver; especially, one who drives furiously.
examples: Among those who seemed disposed to join in this opinion was the Jehu of the Warwickshire coach, who expressed his conviction to our hero, that "he wos a young gent as had much himproved hisself since he tooled him up to the Warsity with his guvnor."
